decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable

Class RAnimationGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable.RAnimationGraphics

  • public class RAnimationGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to handle Animated graphics. The main purpose is to segment a panel of animation frames and create a libgdx animation objects from the frames. Created by wangyufei on 14-10-6.

    • Method Detail

      • createFrame

        public void createFrame(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteTex,
               int width,
               int height,
               int frameNumber)
        Create the animation frames. When no frameTime is given, the default value is 0.085f. The spriteTex should be a panel of sequential animation frames of size width x height, where width is the number of frames wide and height is the number of frames high - that is to say that the width and height are NOT measured in pixels.
        Parameters:
        spriteTex - the texture containing the frames
        width - the width of the panel
        height - the height of the panel
        frameNumber - the number of frames in the panel

      • createFrame

        public void createFrame(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteTex,
               int width,
               int height,
               int frameNumber,
               float frameTime)
        Full constructor. Takes the frameTime for a frame to be shown.
        Parameters:
        spriteTex - the tecture containg the frames
        width - the width of the panel
        height - the height of the panel
        frameNumber - the number of frames in the panel
        frameTime - the time for each frame to be shown

      • createFrame

        public void createFrame(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteTex,
               int width,
               int height,
               int frameNumber,
               float frameTime,
               boolean player)
        Full constructor with player boolean flag. Takes the frameTime for a frame to be shown.
        Parameters:
        spriteTex - the tecture containg the frames
        width - the width of the panel
        height - the height of the panel
        frameNumber - the number of frames in the panel
        frameTime - the time for each frame to be shown
